title: A Boy of India: Rama and his elephant
brief_description: This is the story of Rama, an eight-year-old boy who lives with his family on a tea plantation in Assam, India. The story tells of a very special day in Rama’s life. Accompanying his father, a mahout, to learn how he handles his work elephant, Rama for the first time works with the elephant Gunda as she pulls a stalled tea truck from the stream. Suitable for middle and upper primary levels.
